title: lag spike help plox
body:
so to keep it short, lately i've been lagging alot in game, but my internet is completely fine according to the test i do. I've tried restarting router and stuff as well.
http://www.speedtest.net/my-result/5558043238
That my speedtest result. Everything else online seems fine but i've been getting lots of lag spikes during peek hours of the game (8pm to 1am EST). normal ping is around 50ish and i'll spike and stay at 300-400, as high as 2k for long periods of time. I currently use an ethernet connection as well.

Is there any easy solution to this? Note, this mainly happens during peek hours.

replies.body: You might be having a network issue like packet loss that's causing you to have random input delays.  If you're still having this issue, run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's going wrong.  The results will also offer a set of troubleshoot instructions specific to your issue.  Hope that helps!

Try my post, which is mostly for wifi but can also improve ethernet.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/EuizR9Zc-wifi-lag-spikes-fix
